description: The Autosport Labs ESP32-CAN-X2 is a development board designed to facilitate CAN bus communications for automotive and industrial applications. This device supports up to 40V DC input and offers voltage surge protection. The ESP32-S3-WROOM-1-N8R8 microcontroller powers the board, featuring a dual-core Xtensa LX6 CPU capable of running at up to 240 MHz. The board includes […]
title: ESP32-CAN-X2 Dev Board with Dual CAN Bus Support and Automotive Grade

description: The distributor Waveshare recently featured the Raspberry Pi Compute Module 4S (CM4S), a System on Module based on the Raspberry Pi 4 Model B, intended for industrial applications. It retains the form factor of the older Compute Module 3 and 3+, offering multiple standard peripherals. The CM4S is equipped with a Broadcom BCM2711 quad-core 64-bit […]
title: Raspberry Pi Compute Module 4S with 8GB RAM + 32GB eMMC Now Available for Ordering

description: RAKwireless has introduced the WisGate Soho Pro RAK7267, the latest addition to its LoRaWAN gateway lineup. Designed for both indoor and outdoor deployments, this compact and cost-effective device is ideal for smart agriculture, smart cities, industrial IoT, and remote monitoring solutions, combining essential features of RAK gateways in a robust enclosure. The WisGate Soho Pro […]
title: RAKwireless Unveils WisGate Soho Pro RAK7267: A Compact LoRaWAN Gateway Solution
